name: Snakebutt
description:
"A snake's butt is his conscience and his only companion." --Descartes

You play as a snake's butt. You head has a nose, so it can find its way to food, so you can follow the head to get fed, but you can also choose to not follow the head, if it's heading into danger. Sometimes, it's best not to follow mindlessly, but to take control and avoid disaster.
